reconnect.title: Reconnect Account
reconnect.description: You are about to reconnect your account {{name}}. This will redirect you to your Mastodon server where you'll need to authorize Analytodon again.
reconnect.helper: This is useful if your authorization has expired or if you've revoked access on your Mastodon server.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: This will delete the account {{name}} and all related analytics data. This operation cannot be undone!
delete.instruction: To continue type delete into the field below:

errors.serverUrlAndTimezoneRequired: Server URL and Timezone are required.
errors.failedToConnect: Failed to connect to Mastodon server. Please check the server URL and try again.
errors.accountIdRequired: Account ID is required for this action
errors.failedToAction: Failed to {{action}} account. Please try again.
